alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 7:32PM CDT until March 29 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Northwestern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Medford to near Goltry, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medford, Helena, Pond Creek, Kremlin, Goltry, Jet, Nash, Hunter, Hillsdale, Jefferson and Renfrow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
